mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tyler, Erastus B. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Erastus B.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 28 1861. By Telegraph from Charleston 26 Via Gallipolis 28 1861. Appoint without delay an efficient man to command the eighth Va regt signed L Rubber.' I concur in above the necessity is great & a competent man should be appointed early. EB Tyler Col Cmdg Post 33Hm138pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tyler, Erastus B.
Charleston, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
